content: to cancer sucks hat body continue below for double roll brim cut yarn leaving 8 inch tail set work aside on second set of circular needles cast on 104 sts using long tail cast on place marker and join knit 8 rounds join rims line up both sets of circular needles so they are parallel to each other with the needle holding the 12 row brim to the rear knit 1 st from each set of needles together until all sts are knit and now on one needle note that 3 of the 4 needle points will be used here the right rear needle is not part of the join round the rear needle will be set aside once all the stitches have been joined on the front needle 104 sts on 1 set of needles � cancer sucks hat body next round *k 26 m1* repeat between * s across round 108 sts next round knit work 21 row of cancer sucks chart 3 times across each round blank = mc o = cc � after completion of chart knit all rnds in mc until hat is about 5 5 ins from including naturally rolled bottom edge begin top decrease below changing to dpns when needed to complete note when working decreases keep in mind a desired finished height of between 8 and 9 inches if the hat looks to be getting too tall work fewer knit rnds between the decrease rnds instead of knitting 3 rnds knit only 1 or 2 rnds too short add more rounds between the decrease rounds makes sense go for it top decrease next round *k 10 k2tog* repeat between * s across round 99 sts knit 3 rnds next round *k 9 k2tog* repeat between * s across round 90 sts knit 3 rnds next round *k 8 k2tog* repeat between * s across round 81 sts knit 2 rnds next round *k 7 k2tog* repeat between * s across round 72 sts knit 2 rnds next round *k 6 k2tog* repeat between * s across round 63 sts knit 1 round next round *k 5 k2tog* repeat between * s across round 56 sts knit 1 round next round *k 4 k2tog* repeat between * s across round 45 sts knit 1 round next round *k 3 k2tog* repeat between * s across round 36 sts knit 1 round next round *k 2 k2tog* repeat between * s across round 27 sts knit 1 round next round k2tog across round until 1 st remains k1 14 sts knit 1 round cut yarn leaving 12 inch tail thread tail onto darning needle run needle thru remaining stitches secure to inside of hat with a stitch and run tail thru back of work trim end fairy pull optional using two 12 inch strands of yarn and crochet hook join the double strand to tip of hat using a chain stitch chain 12 join last chain to tip of hat cut yarn leaving 8
